body:
## INSTALL:
    % gem install tw

## DESCRIPTION:
    % twitter client.

## SYNOPSIS:

### show help
    % tw --help

### Tweet
    % tw hello hello

### read Timeline
    % tw @username
    % tw @username @user2 @user3
    % tw @username/listname
    % tw --timeline
    % tw --search=ruby

### DM
    % tw --dm
    % tw --dm:to=shokai "hello!"
name: Tw
